Ok people, don't panic!

Our friend jonassil made a newbie error by not decrypting the files for this DVD.

Here's what you do:
-Download and install "SmartRipper":
http://www.doom9.org/Soft21/Rippers/SR241.rar
-Start program, Load your folder (karaoke party 2) in the top right corner
-Choose Rip-method: "Files", and mark all 10 files
-Choose a target for the decrypted DVD
-Press START

Now your DVD is ready for burning in the chosen target directory!


Cheers
eh, you seem to get a leech error message when using my direct link to SmartRipper. So go to www.doom9.org, and you'll find the program in the downloads section, under Descrambling / Ripping tools .

Yes, just follow mesco's instruction and the new DVD-files will work fine. 

Thank you jonassil for uploading and mesco for the fix
